Installation

From this page, you can download and install Objective software onto a client computer.
Prerequisites:
To be able to install Objective client software on a new computer using the links below, you will need to install the Objective Start Program Launcher first.

Install OBJT Configurator
Install OBJT Configurator (Single Sign-On)

Install OBJT Supervisor
Install OBJT Supervisor (Single Sign-On)

Install Read Only OBJT Supervisor
Install Read Only OBJT Supervisor (Single Sign-On)

Install WMS OperatorClient
Install WMS OperatorClient (Exclusive)

Install MES OperatorClient
Install MES OperatorClient (Exclusive)

Install MES OperatorClient (No Buttonbar)
Install MES OperatorClient (No Buttonbar) (Exclusive)

Install Tag Explorer
